review: I have sampled many Habit trackers but was never satisfied until I found this one. It is the only one that has all the features that I need. I love the interface, it's very easy to use and see. Just what's required with minimum fuss, no complications, and nearly everything has been thought of. A very reasonable yearly payment too, though the free version is also enough. I also get quick responses to any question from the developer. Well done and thank you!

Edit - Random range isnt working, or needs an explanation. Reward = 1 & Range = 100 gave me both 0.59 and 1.91. I don't understand. I just want a simple range of 20-35 coins for example. Other feedback: 1. The "Set Habit Type" option disappears. To change from "Repeat" to "Single" I have to make a new habit, disrupting my data. 2. I can't disable "Timer" in "Custom Modules". 3. Please add a duplicate habit/wish function. 4. I wish you could long-press then slide to edit habits. Thanks so much!
ras4vb: Hello, the random range of 100% means that the final amount obtained is -100% to +100%. Once a habit is created, it is not possible to change the single/repeat  type, because changing the type may cause statistical distortions, so it is prohibited.Other problems will be fixed or considered as soon as possible. Thank you for your advice

review: I don't understand why the reviews are so low. The app is working great and despite the learning curve, its powerful and very customizable. Pros: a functional widget you can check your habits off and see number of days completed, customizable reward system, affordable one time premium fee (RM 18+), easy tutorials, not many ads. Cons: undo tick for a habit is a bit tedious. This is the best habits app with a flexible rewards and punishments system.
Everything is best... but you should have given your own notifications instead of integrating it with calender.. There should also be a "complete" button in the notification
Simple and clean UX, responsive dev. If habit trackers that give you a virtual pet to take care of stress you out, this is a great alternative!

This is the app I've been looking for but would really want the following features: Different coins for certain rewards, such as 10 workout coins = 1 food Wish or 10 cleaning coins = 1 hour games Wish, but you cannot spend 10 cleaning coins on 1 drink Wish, etc. Also would be nice to have a tier/conversion Wish, such as converting 4 drink Wish to 1 bad food Wish, or 4 drinks + 1 food Wish to 1 Brunch, etc.

Very nicely designed habit tracker app. It has beautiful user interface that is easy to understand. You can add icons to your habits, describe them, etc. There are also charts where you can see your progress. Note for devs. The text on the 3rd page of welcome screen is cut. It goes beyond the the screen.
Very nice app. I tried lots of habit-tracking apps, but this one has everything I need. Thank you!
Add a pomodoro timer and this is the best habit app! love it
It's a really good app! I love how easy it is to use and the reword system. But I don't like when the app uses the phones calinder to remind you. I

Perfect for forming better habits! This has helped so much with not only forming better habits, but also keeping in check "bad habits". I don't feel guilty anymore for having 2 drinks on the weekend, because I know I earned it with all my good habits. There's still some bugs that need to be worked out (the back log feature acts up a lot), but still functional and fun!

Greatt app but I'll be rating it with 4 starts for now since it still has a lot of room for improvement. First would be, they could add that calendar streak feature, expand their icon collection (more study icons please), separate the notifications of this app from the phone's own calendar (my phone calendar was already a bit full with my schoolwork due dates, etc and got too crowded when this app's notifications were added to it), and for the custom frequency, please let us specify the date ü•∫

I love the concept of applying gold coins/points for each habit/task. But the incentive for trying to complete more tasks in the day would be highly enhanced if you show the number of coins earned so far today. This should be shown in a big font on the main habit screen instead of having to go to History just to view the gold coins earned.

A very good apps to use, after i use so many habit tracker apps. It can set what habit i want to track, and hide the habit after done, and able to backlog, "tick" yesterday habit if we forget to tick, and it can generate "rewards", that is gold coins, then we use gold coin to reward ourselves, it is fun, user-friendly, and it can pay one time to buy apps, don't need heavy subcription fees, G-R-E-A-T!üëçüèª
ras4vb:

We will try our best to form habits and do better. „Éæ(=ÔΩ•œâÔΩ•=)o
Have a nice dayÔºÅ

review: I'm in love with this app. This has become a part of my daily routine. There are little bugs here and there. I've been looking for an app like yours from lock back. I bought the premium version. Thanks for making the app. Also, as other users suggested please show the count if coins earned per that particular day in the first screen (home screen). Thank you and best wishes for your other projects.

User friendly, cute and with the exact features I need!!!! Not overwhelming like many other apps! 4 stars because I'd like to have the option of paying to get rid of ads. Also the developer built my favourite app so I'd be happy to give something in return. For now I'll send you a hug ü§ó
ras4vb: Thanks for you for your love of our app(Loop Habit - Habit Tracker, Goals, Daily Habits ), we will improve the function as soon as possible, and provide the function of pay to remove advertising.

review: I really like this app, I wish there is a calendar view of the app so I can see the weekly habits on the specific day

Actually, it is a plain app but it has all the needed options for a habit tracker. It has a wide variety of icons too.... which in my opinion makes it really aesthetic. You can also log in how much money for each habit, so that after you've finished the habit, it gives you the amount of money, which is really nice. So, if you're looking for an app like this, I recommend you to download it. Keep up with the good work. Thank you.
ras4vb: Thanks for you for your love of our app(Loop Habit - Habit Tracker, Goals, Daily Habits ).

review: Everything's great except for the fact that you can't add notes to the habit that you just completed. The stats are not very useful either. But I love how you can set a habit to be completed by a certain number of times a week. Most habit trackers don't have that.

Just bought the app and find it quite useful to track habit. However need few improvements such as: - copy n paste for habit and wish: as i want copy the existing habit/wish and rename it with different habit/wish - allow entering negative coin: to be used to record bad habit case so that it minus the coin balance - allow tracking for multiple users: for my case, plan to use it to track my kids' habit too - allow filter history log based on group - set icon as non mandatory since not important

I really like this app, i even paid for this app, however, it doesn't sync well with google calendar. One day everything is in sync... the next day, there's no reminders bec it ain't in sync no more. I uninstalled it and emailed the team regarding this issue... will start using it again once they've replied to my email and resolve the issue.
ras4vb:
Sorry for this problem. üò•
As far as we know, Google Calendar cannot insert notifications. Calendars of other systems can be inserted normally. Google Calendar did not provide the interface for inserting notifications to developers.
In the future, we will realize the notification through other ways.

review: i searched through many and this was the chosen. simple and cute. thank you for your work, bought premium. one thing to add though: maybe you could make the wishes display the description when viewing list? i want to add habit-specific requirements for my wishes and would love it if I could easily read them too.
this is a nice simple app to track and reward good habits. I'm having fun with it!
This is the best of its kind. Has useful and efficient features which motivates you to do what you hae to. It is cute, simple and functional. Highly recommended! Reminds you too.
ras4vb: Thanks for your love of our app(Loop Habit - Habit Tracker, Goals, Daily Habits ).

review: App is nice and easy to use. Helps me to track my task or habits easily, only thing is that cannot be used for more than 7 habit without in app purchase. If you could increase that by a little would be really useful.

I've paid the premium upgrade but it is not activated yet. Will update the rating when it is activated. Edit: Now the premium activated. I would give 3 star for bothersome upgrade, but end with 4 since the developer is very helpful & fast response.
It's very simple and neat, the wish system really helps keeping me motivated

I would said this is perfect if not because the calendar problem.. The habits are showing on my phone calendar.. I downloaded the separate tracker coz i want my calendar just for work schedule & important event. If i unsync, reminder not functioning.. Is there a way that i dont know?
ras4vb: Hello, using the system calendar to remind is the most stable way to remind. Because the app self reminder is easy to be killed by the system, it is not used. In the future, we will try to add a better way to remind ourselves.

review: The system of giving rewards for reaching a certain amount of coins was very motivating. The app is also clean and astheticly pleasing. Thanks to the developers.

review: I really love this app. Easy to use, it is what I've been looking for. Only one thing to improve, add more icons please. Even with premium it lacks a lot of icons
It's nice a application. But I cannot select a calendar for reminders. They end up in another account, which is very inconvenient. please tell me how can I choose another account in calendar
The app has a very neat and pretty design but there are some bugs. I've watched 3 ads but it still doesn't allow me to use a premium icon.
